description: Hull KR assistant Shaun Kenny-Dowall extends his contract until the end of next season.
title: Shaun Kenny-Dowall: Hull KR assistant extends contract
title_page: Shaun Kenny-Dowall: Hull KR assistant extends contract - BBC Sport
maintext:
Hull KR assistant Shaun Kenny-Dowall has extended his contract until the end of next season.
The 36-year-old joined the Robins as a player in 2020 and made 93 appearances before retiring at the end of 2023.
He then moved into a development coach role before stepping up to assistant.
"It's a massive opportunity for me and I'm really happy to be staying at Hull KR. For me, it was a no-brainer," Kenny-Dowall told the club website., external
"I love this club and what it's given me. I'm really grateful for the opportunity to remain here and keep building.
"With these new responsibilities comes more pressure but I'm enjoying the high pressure, high reward environment as we want to get the best of us as staff and the boys."
